text: On the twenty-first day of the seventh month, the Lord’s message came through the prophet Haggai again:

“<st data-num="0559 04994 0559">Ask the following questions</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02216" class="">Zerubbabel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07597" class="">Shealtiel</st>, <st data-num="06346" class="">governor</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, the <st data-num="01419" class="">high</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03087" class="">Jehozadak</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="07611" class="">remnant</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>:

‘<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> among you <st data-num="07604 0834">survivors</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="07223" class="">former</st> <st data-num="03519" class="">splendor</st> of <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04100" class="">How</st> does it <st data-num="07200" class="">look</st> to <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st>? <st data-num="03808" class="">Isn’t</st> it <st data-num="0369 05869">nothing</st> by <st data-num="03644" class="">comparison</st>?’

Even so, take heart, Zerubbabel,” decrees the Lord. “Take heart, Joshua son of Jehozadak, the high priest. And take heart all you citizens of the land,” decrees the Lord, “and begin to work. For I am with you,” decrees the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.

“Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st>, because I <st data-num="03772" class="">made</st> a <st data-num="01697" class="">promise</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">to</st> your ancestors when they <st data-num="03318" class="">left</st> <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, and my <st data-num="07307" class="">Spirit</st><n id="1" /> even now <st data-num="05975" class="">testifies</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">to</st> you.”<n id="2" />
Moreover, this is what the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has said: “In just a little while I will once again shake the sky and the earth, the sea and the dry ground.
I will also shake up all the nations, and they will offer their treasures; then I will fill this temple with glory.” So the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has said.
“The silver and gold will be mine,” decrees the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.
“The future splendor of this temple will be greater than that of former times,” the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has declared. “And in this place I will give peace,” decrees the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.
On the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month of Darius’ second year, the Lord’s message came to the prophet Haggai:
“This is what the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has said, ‘Ask the priests about the law.

<st data-num="02005" class="">If</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">carries</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">meat</st> in a <st data-num="03671" class="">fold</st> of his <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> and that <st data-num="03671" class="">fold</st> <st data-num="05060 0413">touches</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st>, a <st data-num="05138" class="">boiled dish</st>, <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st>, <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>, or <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> other <st data-num="03978" class="">food</st>, will that item <st data-num="06942" class="">become holy</st>?’”<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">answered</st>, “It will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st>.”
Then Haggai asked, “If a person who is ritually unclean because of touching a dead body comes in contact with one of these items, will it become unclean?” The priests answered, “It will be unclean.”
Then Haggai responded, “‘The people of this nation are unclean in my sight,’ decrees the Lord. ‘And so is all their effort; everything they offer is also unclean.
Now therefore reflect carefully on the recent past, before one stone was laid on another in the Lord’s temple.

From <st data-num="01961" class="">that time</st><n id="1" /> when one <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">expecting</st> a <st data-num="06194" class="">heap</st> of <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> measures, there <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> only <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st>; when one <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03342" class="">wine vat</st> to <st data-num="02834" class="">draw out</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> measures from <st data-num="06333" class="">it</st>, there <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> only <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st>.
I struck all the products of your labor with blight, disease, and hail, and yet you brought nothing to me,’ says the Lord.
‘Think carefully about the past: from today, the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month, to the day work on the temple of the Lord was resumed, think about it.
The seed is still in the storehouse, isn’t it? And the vine, fig tree, pomegranate, and olive tree have not produced. Nevertheless, from today on I will bless you.’”
Then the Lord spoke to Haggai a second time on the twenty-fourth day of the month:

“<st data-num="0559 0413 0559">Tell</st> <st data-num="02216" class="">Zerubbabel</st> <st data-num="06346" class="">governor</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>: ‘<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am ready<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="07493" class="">shake</st> the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st><n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.

I will <st data-num="02015" class="">overthrow</st> <st data-num="04467" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="03678" class="">thrones</st> and <st data-num="08045" class="">shatter</st> the <st data-num="02392" class="">might</st> of <st data-num="01471" class="">earthly</st> <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdoms</st>.<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="02015" class="">overthrow</st> <st data-num="04818" class="">chariots</st> and those who <st data-num="07392" class="">ride</st> them, and <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st> and their <st data-num="07392" class="">riders</st> will <st data-num="03381" class="">fall</st> as <st data-num="0376" class="">people</st> <st data-num="02719" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">one another</st>.<n id="2" />

On that day,’ says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, ‘I will take you, Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel, my servant,’ says the Lord, ‘and I will make you like a signet ring, for I have chosen you,’ says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.”
